bestBHT.bht: If this man were not from God, he could do nothing. The man has scored with terrific power in his use of Scripture and logic. If this man were not from God, he could do nothing. The man has scored with terrific power in his use of Scripture and logic. The fact that Jesus could perform miracles like this was full proof that he was commissioned by God. One such miracle proves that he was from God and comes from him.

If this man were not from God, he could do nothing. This statement highlights the power and authority of Jesus. The fact that he could perform miracles like opening the eyes of a man born blind was full proof that he was commissioned by God. This extraordinary miracle not only showcases Jesus' ability to heal but also serves as undeniable evidence of his divine origin. The miraculous works that Jesus performed were not just random acts, but intentional displays of his divinity.
